#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    int n,a,b,c;
    unsigned long long int sum;
    while(t--)
    {
              sum=0;
              cin>>n>>a>>b>>c;
              for(int i=0;i<=n&&i<=a;i++)
              for(int j=0;j<=(n-i)&&j<=b;j++)
              {
                      if((n-i-j)<c)
                      sum=sum+n-i-j+1;
                      else
                      sum=sum+c+1;
                      }
                      cout<<sum<<endl;
              }

  
  return 0;  
    }
